verbs.description: [ARG0: red sox] [V: slug] [ARG1: their way past dodgers] [ARGM-PRP: to take game 1 of world series andrew benintendi j d martinez] and the red sox came out swinging in the world series opener seizing every advantage in their quirky ballpark to beat the dodgers 8 - 4 on a chilly windy tuesday night dodgers eduardo nunez los angeles dodgers boston red sox j d martinez jd martinez red sox andrew benintendi eduardo núñez world series
